summary: Generated 1 triage findings from aggregate metrics. This report prioritizes route bias, surface imbalance, and calibration signals.

hypotheses.title: Predicted CTR shows drift vs observed (mean pred_ctr - ctr = +0.0131).
hypotheses.validation: Run targeted A/B as suggested; confirm effect on route share, CTR, and value composition.

experiments.name: Calibration adjustment A/B (temperature scaling)
experiments.description: Apply calibration layer to pred_ctr and/or score scaling; measure stability and downstream CTR/value proxies.

notes: System is noisy and landscape changes frequently; prefer short ramp, strong guardrails, and holdout-based validation.
Aggregate metrics can hide segment-level regressions; slice by surface×route×user cohorts where possible.
Beware of novelty effects and auction dynamics when adjusting route share/privilege.
